profile.name: Vinod Prakash
profile.headline: Data Scientist & Software Engineer
profile.heroDescription: I build production-grade scalable SaaS platforms and ML system. Backend, Data, and AI engineer specializing in end-to-end pipelines from ingestion to deployment. I turn research-grade ideas into robust APIs, workflows, and user-facing applications that perform in the real world.
aboutMeBio: I build production-grade machine learning systems and the software products around them. My work sits at the intersection of scalable backend engineering, applied machine learning, and modern SaaS delivery. I take messy data, experimental models, and research-grade ideas and turn them into robust APIs, automated workflows, and user-facing applications that perform reliably in real-world environments.

With a Master's in Data Science and a Bachelor's in Computer Engineering, I bring a blend of strong engineering fundamentals and practical ML expertise. I enjoy designing clean data pipelines, deploying ML models at scale, and building cloud-native systems that are fast, reliable, and maintainable.

workSpans.title: AI/ML
workSpans.items: LLM-powered applications, RAG systems, vector databases, applied ML models

workSpans.title: SaaS Engineering
workSpans.items: API-driven architectures, real-time features, production monitoring

experiences.title: Software Engineer (AI)
experiences.description:
• Built multimodal RAG pipelines over 50M+ clinical notes and imaging metadata using FAISS and Azure OpenAI, improving accuracy by 27%
• Designed distributed Spark + Airflow pipelines processing 200GB+ data/day with schema validation and lineage tracking
• Developed LLM-powered agents for summarization, entity extraction, and temporal reasoning, reducing manual review time by 40%
• Implemented AI observability using Prometheus and Grafana, monitoring latency, drift, and hallucination rates across 10+ pipelines
• Collaborated with 5+ clinicians and data engineers to validate outputs, refine retrieval prompts, and ensure clinically grounded results

experiences.title: AI Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
• Built and operated Python backend services for BizBrain AI, a GenAI platform analytics over enterprise finance and operations data
• Designed REST APIs and async workers to handle 90K+ analytical queries/day, maintaining sub 350ms P95 latency under peak load
• Integrated LLM inference layers with backend services, enabling real-time insight generation without exposing raw enterprise data
• Solved latency bottlenecks by optimizing request batching and caching strategies, improving end-to-end response time by 32%
• Deployed and monitored BizBrain AI services in cloud environments, supporting 2 enterprise pilots with zero downtime during demos

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
• Built and owned Python backend services for Zoho Invoice, powering invoicing, tax calculation, and payment workflows for 100K+ global SMB customers
• Designed REST APIs and asynchronous job processors to handle 800K invoices/day, achieving 99.95% uptime during peak billing cycles
• Redesigned background task orchestration to remove processing bottlenecks, reducing invoice delivery latency by 41%
• Integrated fault tolerant workflows using AWS SQS, retry mechanisms, and idempotency, cutting failed invoice & payment jobs 35%
• Added structured logging, metrics, and CloudWatch alarms, reducing MTTR by 45% and improving incident response

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description:
• Analyzed 5–7M+ historical credit card transaction records to identify fraud trends, anomaly patterns, and merchant risk indicators
• Built SQL-based analytical datasets aggregating transactions by card, merchant, geography, and time for daily fraud rate reporting
• Designed Power BI dashboards tracking fraud KPIs improving analyst investigation efficiency 25%
• Developed Python-based data preprocessing scripts to clean, validate, enrich transactional datasets, reducing data inconsistencies 20%
• Automated daily and weekly fraud reporting workflows, cutting manual analyst reporting effort by 40% and improving turnaround time

experiences.title: AI/ML Intern
experiences.description:
• Processed 1M+ gold-loan transaction records to build supervised ML models for revenue prediction and trend estimation
• Built time-series forecasting models (ARIMA, SARIMAX) to predict monthly revenue, achieving MAPE of 13% on holdout data
• Trained and compared Linear Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost models, improving accuracy 25% over baseline models
• Engineered customer, loan, and gold-price–driven features, increasing model explanatory power and stability
• Built Python dashboards and visual reports to monitor revenue trends and ML forecast accuracy, improving reporting time by 35%

experiences.title: Research Assistantship - AI/ML
experiences.description:
• Assisted in AI-driven healthcare research by analyzing 10K+ anonymized clinical and imaging records
• Built CNN and LSTM models using TensorFlow and PyTorch for cancer risk prediction, achieving 94% accuracy and ROC–AUC of 0.92
• Improved F1-score by 21% over baseline ML models by applying deep learning techniques on combined clinical and imaging datasets
• Applied OpenCV-based image preprocessing, reducing false positives by 26% and improving model sensitivity by 19%
• Engineered ensemble models (CNN embeddings + XGBoost) improving accuracy by 14% in heterogeneous biomedical datasets

education.description: Coursework in Big Data Analysis, Data Management, Algorithms, Distributed Systems, ML, Statistical Computing.

education.degree: Bachelor's degree, Electronics and Communications Engineering
education.description: Focused on Python, DSA, OOP, Computer Networks, DBMS, OS, ML.

projects.title: Agent Runtime Orchestrator
projects.description: Designed a cloud-native agent runtime that supports multi-agent workflows with distributed task scheduling, retry logic, and state recovery. Built an event-driven orchestration layer using Redis + Celery/Kafka to coordinate autonomous agents with fault tolerance.

projects.title: Distributed Job Execution Engine
projects.description: Built a distributed job execution engine capable of processing 100K+ asynchronous tasks per day with autoscaling and fault-tolerant execution across worker nodes. Implemented a queue-based architecture using Kafka and Redis Streams.

projects.title: LLM-Powered Financial Document Search Platform
projects.description: Built a semantic RAG search engine over 10M+ financial documents using GPT-4o, LLaMA 3, and Pinecone. Automated secure ETL pipelines for regulatory filings using Airflow + AWS S3 with schema validation.

projects.title: URL Shortener & Analytics Platform
projects.description: Built a high‑performance URL shortening service capable of handling millions of redirects per month with sub‑50ms P95 latency. Designed a collision‑free short‑code generator using Base62 encoding.

projects.title: E‑Commerce Backend System
projects.description: Developed a production‑grade e‑commerce backend supporting products, carts, orders, inventory, payments, and fulfillment for 80K+ monthly transactions. Integrated Stripe payments with webhook‑based flows.

projects.title: Loan Default Prediction System
projects.description: Built a credit risk prediction system using real-world financial data. Engineered 200+ features and trained XGBoost/LightGBM models. Integrated SHAP for explainability and deployed via FastAPI.

projects.title: E‑Commerce Fraud Detection
projects.description: Developed a real-time fraud detection system using behavioral and transactional features. Implemented a scoring pipeline to flag suspicious orders and reduce manual review load.

projects.title: Airbnb Home Price Prediction
projects.description: Developed a regression model to predict Airbnb listing prices based on location and amenities. Performed extensive feature engineering to deliver interpretable pricing insights.

projects.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Built a sentiment classification pipeline using Twitter data and BERT. Extended to support multi-class emotion detection with a FastAPI-based scoring service.

projects.title: News Source Classification
projects.description: Built a system to classify headlines from Fox News vs NBC News using NLP techniques. Achieved 80% accuracy with an SVM model detecting subtle linguistic cues.

projects.title: Jane Street Market Forecasting
projects.description: Built a forecasting model trained on 47M+ market snapshots. Developed a LightGBM engine to estimate short-horizon price movements for algorithmic trading signals.
